category.name: Business Modeler
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: METHOD_CM_execute_before_custom
preference.preference_description: Determines whether all canned methods are executed at a site before site custom methods or after site custom methods. Valid Values: 0 - All canned methods are registered after site custom methods are registered. 1 - All canned methods are registered before site custom methods are registered.
